title: MIFlowCyt Optical Filter
description: Each optical filter of the instrument shall be described.

type.description: The optical filter type shall be specified (e.g., band pass filter, long pass filter, dichroic long pass filters, short pass filter, dichroic short pass filter, polarizer excitation filter, grating, prism).

transmittedWavelengths.description: Light wavelengths transmitted by the filter shall be specified (e.g., 488/25 nm, >670 nm, <620 nm).

installationDate.description: As optical filters of all types are subject to degradation, filter performance needs to be monitored at intervals to verify continued performance at an acceptable level [19]. The optical filter installation date shall be specified (e.g., January 15, 2007).

other.description: Other relevant optical filter details should be provided.
